# PLAYER::SET_POLICE_IGNORE_PLAYER

## Summary
Use this to stop the police arresting the player

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** ignorePlayer

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
The player will be ignored by the police if toggle is set to true
